Subject: The Otyebis

(Zardus, your Suka, remember?  HINT HINT!  WINK WINK!)

President Kaiser/Sequencer/Sinew/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:





Kaiser sat in his luxurious office and was a little disgusted.  All the IGL 
presidents before him had been organics of some type because of prejudice, 
hence the office for the organics, with all the padded chairs and such.  The 
office was so large it even had a small grassy prarie.  He'd been President 
for twelve years but still hadn't been able to remodel the office but no one 
would let him.

Typing on his computer terminal on his huge he read over five hundred 
messages from sponsors, broadcasters, and investors, reading five hundred 
lengthy messages in under a minute.  A ring came from his terminal and he 
pressed a few buttons and a link was instantly set up.

"What's going on?"

"Well, Kaiser," a voice replied over the comm., "we've got those three Preds 
you requested to see.  Don't really see why you'd--"

"Shut up, Sinew, and just do it."

"Yes, sir."

Kaiser stood up from his seat and stretched his mechanical joints and then 
sat back down as the doors opened to his huge office.

In walked several armed humanoids with laser and ballistic rifles in red and 
gold uniforms, in the middle of them were the ten foot tall robot, Sequencer, 
and the perfect looking Sinew, his uniform consisting of more metal and pads 
instead of just fabric like most of the other IGL security officers.

Sinew pushed forward the now completely unarmed bounty hunters, Imprisoner, 
Predator, an Choran.

"Nice set up you got here." Imprisoner said, seeing that obviously Kaiser was 
in charge around here.  "Question is what do you want with us?"

"First off, I am President Kaiser of the IGL, Intergalactic Gladiatorial 
League.  The League, or IGL as we prefer, is filled with combatants from all 
over the Universe.  Robots and organics alike--"

"What's the point?" Predator asked as he interrupted.

Sinew sent an armored fist forward that hit the middle of Predator's back 
sending him collapsing forward to his knees, weapons pointed at Imprisoner 
and Choran, making them decide not to retaliate.

"My point, Predacons, is it helps unite the Universe and believe or not helps 
stops wars.  More than it starts anyway.  Warring species solve their 
differences in the arenas we have.  Much better for business and we make 
great profits.  We've already bought several planets and moons and the IGL is 
even a government body.  And your sole purpose is to fill up slots in the 
Intergalactic Gladiatorial League Championship that will be taking on Past 
Earth very soon where we may recruit more slot fillers."

"Why would they fight?" Choran asked.

"The rewards.  If one of you three manage to actually win, which is doubtful, 
you could be rewarded.  Now get these worthless Cybertronians out of my 
sight.  They're the scourge of the galaxy."

"And what the slag are you?"

Kaiser simply walked back to his office, not responding as the bounty hunters 
were lead away back towards their cells many levels down through the 
ginormous Otyebis.

Kaiser was thirteen and a half feet tall.  He was red and gold and was 
toughly built looking like he could fight, and he could, being a former IGL 
champion five years, which was got him his job as President despite his being 
a robot.  He used to be a general in a robotic army of a robotic society from 
a planet called Ketrad where they had murdered their organic masters.  They 
were treated well, but they just despised them for some reason and made them 
extinct.

He activated his comm. to the Vice President of IGL, Suka.  "Suka, report to 
my office immediately." (THAT'S YOU ZARDUS)
